definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: It was, instead, an example of Chinese stagecraft.
sentences.chinese: 這次對話是中國式做戲的一個典範。

sentences.english: Australian Shiraz is also a model of wine.
sentences.chinese: 也是澳洲穗樂仙葡萄酒的典範。

sentences.english: COSCO is today perceived as a model company in China as well as in the world shipping community.
sentences.chinese: 中遠在中國和世界航運界已被公認爲是公司的典範。

sentences.english: Reciprocal teaching is a model of inactive learning's application in reading comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 交互教學就是元認知缺陷觀應用於閱讀教學的典範。

sentences.english: Canonic types served as a point of departure.
sentences.chinese: 典範類型擔任一個出發點。

sentences.english: Paraphrases provide sufficient information, clear directions and rich examples. It is the model of new dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 釋義準確全面，例證豐富，是新型詞典的典範。

sentences.english: Bingxin's proses made great contributions to establish a standard for modern Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 冰心散文對建立現代漢語的典範卓有貢獻。

sentences.english: Bingxin is the classic representative of love philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 冰心是愛的哲學的典範代表。

sentences.english: And what made their combined skill-sets a recipe for success?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼讓他們的組合成了成功的典範？

sentences.english: Enter that paragon of self-reliance, the entrepreneur.
sentences.chinese: 企業家毫無疑問是自立的典範。

sentences.english: But we do know that this is the epitome of an export-driven economy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我們確切的知道這是個出口導向型經濟的典範。

sentences.english: The Sino-Saudi relationship has become a model in Sino-Arabian cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中沙關係已經成爲中阿合作的一個典範。

sentences.english: And the West lake of Hangzhou is an even more exemplifying model for gardens and parks.
sentences.chinese: 而杭州西湖則是園林和公園中猶爲卓著的典範。

sentences.english: Tight monomials are the simplest elements in the canonical basis.
sentences.chinese: 緊單項式是典範基中最簡單的元素。

sentences.english: The masterpiece is an exemplar of well-written software.
sentences.chinese: 所謂傑作，是編寫良好的軟件典範。

sentences.english: Paradigmatic rules are socialized norms that force firms to take into isomorphism seriously.
sentences.chinese: 典範規則即規範產業同形的社會化壓力。

definition: to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
to develop/to make full use of
